Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield Libraries, Archives and Information. A comprehensive reference, information and lending service with a wide range of music and films. The CD collection includes anything from bhangra to blues, choral to cajun and rock to reggae. The DVD collection includes drama, thrillers, sci-fi, music, Asian languages, world cinema, documentaries, sport and travel. Hire services providing vocal scores and orchestral sets for local groups. Scores, songbooks, books on music for loan. Reference materials and magazines. Provides 3 People's Network computers available with Microsoft Office and Internet access for public use.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon 10am-8pm, Tues, Thurs, Fri & Sat 9.30am-5.30pm, Wed 9.30am-8pm
